author: cgsavard
body:
This PR updates the current track quality classifier used in tracking. The update uses new chi2rphi, chi2rz, and bendchi2 bins. This switch can be explained [here](https://indico.cern.ch/event/1058340/contributions/4456095/attachments/2287755/3888672/L1T_7_27_21.pdf).

This PR is correlated to another PR made in the L1 tracking code to update the features of the classifier. You can find this other PR [here](https://github.com/cms-L1TK/cmssw/pull/161).
title: Update default track quality classifier
